{'content': {'application/json': {'schema': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {'expiration_period': {'type': 'string', 'format': 'duration', 'description': 'The expiration period of the signing secret in the [ISO 8601 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations). 

If defined, when the signing secret is rotated, it continues to be valid until the expiration period passes.

Otherwise, it is invalidated immediately.

Maximum expiration period is 7 days.', 'maximum': 'P7D', 'example': 'PT5H30M'}}}, 'examples': {'webhook_signing_secret_rotate_request': {'summary': 'Webhook signing secret rotation request', 'value': {'expiration_period': 'PT5H30M'}}}}}} is not valid under any of the given schemas
